A MISSOURI PACIFIC CREW SAW ENGINE GBW 307 CASH INTO TWO OLD ROCK ISLAND CARS ON THE WYE TRACK AT HOT SPRINGS JUNCTION AT 8:55 A.M., 1-2-82. THIS CREW WENT TOENGINE AFTER CRASH, BUT DID NOT AT ANY TIME SEE ANYONE. THIS TRACKAGE USED JOINTLY BY THE LITTLE ROCK & WESTERN RAILWAY CORPORATION AND THE MISSOURI PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY ON LEASEFROM THE TRUSTEE OF THE ROCK ISLAND RAILROAD AS INTERIM OPERATORS UNDER I.C.C.
